Api

Class ExecutionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Api.ExecutionService

  • @Service
public class ExecutionService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a service which manage commands in execution , bind each of them with id , register them , and create thread for each execution

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ExecutionService()
